Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the viral image by stating that it is the first time citizens are calling the Prime Minister a thief in 70 years.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to prove that the image is indeed of women holding placards that say "Modi chor."
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image is authentic and not manipulated or altered in any way.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility that the placards in the image may have been altered or manipulated to convey a different message.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the original image was related to the inauguration of a government healthcare program, not a protest against the Prime Minister.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing a clear source or evidence for the statement made by the Facebook page ABMB.
